about_the_game:
You can sculpt everything with the soft clay... So the coach creates the player. And the best coach creates the best player! He offers a chance for you to become his clay and to sculpt the winner of Business Tour! You will stand on top, execute your signature move and remove all obstacles in your path. With a coach like that a single red card does not matter, because countless victories are waiting for you. And the dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will be a pleasant bonus.

After buying this content, you get to your collection of characters "Coach", "Coach's dice", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.
